reviewText: This is very relaxing, good quality, very soothing music and scenery.  Thanks to the production and all who put their efforts in this fine piece of art.  Good medicine for the soul!  I would recommend this for anyone who just needs a peaceful moment in their lives.  I received merchandise in a timely manner.  Very satisfied.

Great Smoky Mountains National Park DVD PostcardIts a good job TV programs are such awful rubbish it give me more time and pleasure to just relax and watch another lovely dvd. I see such beauty it hurts at times, indeed the Mountains appear blue and smoky and mysterious in the distance the fall colours are perfect in colour contrast. The little surprises of wild animals are a treat, all helping to make you feel you are there. I just love it and fully recommend this dvd. http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006RNOQ90/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_imghttp://

I bought DVD because I love this part of the country, especially in the autumn.  The video was wonderful with the red, yellow and orange leaves in full color against a backdrop of the mountains and rivers of Virginia, Tennessee and North Carolina.  I enjoyed the wildlife shots also.  Very relaxing music also.  I've left it on for a couple hours straight because the music is enjoyable to listen to while I do my chores around the house.  Lovely.
